programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: The Color Purple, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son and the boozy misanthrope who lives next door.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: Traffik, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: Ruth, a dedicated mother, begins to fear for her troubled teenage daughter.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: The Accountant, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Villeneuve Pironi: Racing's Untold Tragedy, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: The story of Canadian Formula 1 legend Gilles Villeneuve and French star Didier Pironi, two fearless Ferrari Formula 1 drivers, forever torn apart by a historic and hugely controversial moment in time.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Mass Ave, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: A racial profiling incident forever changes the relationship between a man and his son.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Cut Bank, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: Batman and Superman: Battle of the Super Sons, (2022, Animated)
programme.desc: On his birthday, Jonathan Kent learns his dad is Superman and that he has superpowers of his own. He also meets Damian Wayne. The two boys are forced to team up to protect their loved ones from a hostile alien force.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Skin, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: The Souvenir, (2019, Romance)
programme.desc: A shy but ambitious film student falls into an intense, emotionally fraught relationship with a charismatic but untrustworthy older man.

programme.title: Knight and Day, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Lady Bird, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: The Iron Claw, (2023, Biography)
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: Warcraft, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A king (Dominic Cooper), a mighty warrior (Travis Fimmel) and a powerful wizard (Ben Foster) unite to defend the human realm of Azeroth from a tyrannical shaman (Daniel Wu) and his invading army of orcs.

programme.title: Denial, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Writer David Irving (Timothy Spall) wages a legal battle against historian Deborah Lipstadt (Rachel Weisz) after she accuses him of denying the Holocaust.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: A United Kingdom, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friend's widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singer's debut album.

programme.title: Where to Invade Next, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Michael Moore visits various countries, including France, Italy, Germany, Finland and Slovenia, to examine how Europeans view work, education, health care, sex, equality, and other issues.

programme.title: Challengers, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wife's former boyfriend.

programme.title: Atlantic City, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A boardwalk numbers runner (Burt Lancaster) feels young again with a casino clam shucker (Susan Sarandon) and a lucky cocaine deal.

programme.title: Dark Blue, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: A rookie policeman (Scott Speedman) objects when his hard-edged partner (Kurt Russell) conspires with his mentor (Brendan Gleeson) to pin murders on two ex-convicts.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Crimson Tide, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two U.S. Navy officers (Denzel Washington, Gene Hackman) clash aboard a nuclear submarine bound for Russia, while that country is under rebel siege.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acting CIA chief (Harrison Ford) learns the president has triggered a war with Colombian drug cartels.

programme.title: Apollo 13, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert try to return to Earth after an explosion aborts the April 1970 moonshot.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke Ellis wakes up at The Institute, a facility that abducts teenagers with psychic powers; Ms. Sigsby, the place's charismatic director, claims they're saving the world; Tim Jamieson hides from his haunted past as a small-town night knocker.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke bonds with the other Front Half residents and begins plotting his escape; Ms. Sigsby manages the fallout from a security breach; in town, Tim begins to look into The Institute, only to find himself caught up in a high-stakes standoff.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: A group of Allied soldiers are intent on breaking out, not only to escape, but also to draw Nazi forces away from battle to search for fugitives. Among the prisoners are American Captain Virgil Hilts and British Squadron Leader Roger Bartlett.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: U.S. lawyers (Anthony Hopkins, Matthew McConaughey) defend Africans who revolted against their Spanish captors aboard a slave ship in 1839.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: A police captain saves three young adults (Claire Danes, Giovanni Ribisi, Omar Epps) from jail, recruiting them to work under cover in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, War)
programme.desc: An imprisoned U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) fights the military overlord (Oh Soon-tek) of a slave-labor opium operation in Vietnam.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Considered a suspect in a deadly arson, a police chief must cover his tracks while trying to prove his innocence.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Novocaine, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.title: Blink Twice, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: Married to the Mob, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Matthew Modine) gets close to a gangster's widow (Michelle Pfeiffer) in order to nab a crime boss (Dean Stockwell).

programme.title: Danica
programme.desc: Racing superstar Danica Patrick reveals herself like never before: as a competitor preparing for her next race, a woman confidently considering when she wants to start a family and a budding mogul carefully considering thinking about her next steps.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween, (2016, Hallowe'en)
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service, (1969, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (George Lazenby) proposes to a contessa (Diana Rigg) and foils SPECTRE chief Blofeld's (Telly Savalas) agricultural plot.

programme.title: The Living Daylights, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond (Timothy Dalton) takes a Czech cellist (Maryam d'Abo) to her boyfriend, a KGB defector (Jeroen Krabb) doing business in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Octopussy, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) links a fake Faberge egg to smugglers (Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan) in league with a mad Soviet general.

programme.title: Live and Let Die, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Roger Moore) charms a tarot reader (Jane Seymour) in Jamaica on the voodoo/heroin trail of Mr. Big (Yaphet Kotto).

programme.title: From Russia With Love, (1963, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) lands in Istanbul with a Russian beauty (Daniela Bianchi), a pawn in SPECTRE's plot to kill him.

programme.title: GoldenEye, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A secret weapon's theft sends Agent 007 to Russia, where a pretty computer programmer helps him track an ex-cohort believed dead.

programme.title: Die Another Day, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: James Bond (Pierce Brosnan) teams with a beautiful agent (Halle Berry) to battle a terrorist and a businessman (Toby Stephens) bent on world domination.

programme.title: Dr. No, (1962, Action)
programme.desc: Agent 007 (Sean Connery) foils a SPECTRE madman (Joseph Wiseman) out to divert rockets from Cape Canaveral.

programme.title: The Fire Inside, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her country's history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: An erotic sleepover; the seduction of VR porn; rekindling one's sex life after a long illness.

programme.title: Jason's Lyric, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: A TV salesman falls for a spirited waitress and clashes with his wayward brother, as their lives reconnect in inner-city Houston.

programme.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing, (2022, Fantasy)
programme.desc: While attending a conference in Istanbul, Dr. Alithea Binnie happens to encounter a djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom. Eventually, she's beguiled and makes a wish that surprises them both.

programme.title: The Institute

programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara

programme.sub-title: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar

programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!

programme.title: Por amor ao chocolate, (2021, Romance)
programme.desc: Prestes a competir em um importante concurso de confeitaria, Aria v seus planos desmoronarem quando seu parceiro a abandona poucos dias antes do evento. No entanto, sua sorte muda ao conhecer um charmoso pai solteiro.

programme.desc: Uma empresria de Miami, Flrida, se ajusta sua nova vida em uma pequena cidade de Minnesota.

programme.title: A Verdadeira Histria de Ned Kelly, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um olhar sobre o mito da vida de Ned Kelly, o maior fora-da-lei da histria da Austrlia, desde sua juventude at sua morte, observando o passado de violncia de toda uma sociedade, incluindo a lendria rebelio que planejou na dcada de 1870.

programme.title: Caador de Demnios, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O caador de demnios Jebediah Woodley viaja at uma pequena cidade ao sul do Mississippi na expectativa de enfrentar um demnio. Quando a entidade maligna acidentalmente libertada, ela comea a possuir e matar os moradores da regio.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Gaviota libertada e Diana se sente sozinha na priso, mas ela se oferece para pagar sua fiana.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Diana v Maximiliano e lembra que ele a viu quando foi presa; Yolanda apresenta Dona Santa a Diana.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Abayomi revela sua filha que Jacob tambm seu filho; Abayomi decide deixar Lagos; Jacob vai para a priso com sua me para dar as boas-vindas ao seu irmo Andile.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Lerato est grvida; Prospero no gosta da proposta de Abayomi, o que cria rivalidade entre ele e Jacob; Thembi perdoa Jacob pela sua colaborao com Abayomi; Jacob e Lerato se casam.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob enfrenta as queixas de Lerato; Bola procura seu pai para o matar.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Folak descobre o cadver do seu pai e as suas suspeitas recaem sobre Bola; Bola quer enviar os restos mortais do seu pai para Lagos; os ltimos desejos do Chefe Abayomi so revelados.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Bola quer unir o Conselho sua causa e ameaa Jacob se ele ficar em Lagos; os associados de Jacob esto nervosos por Abayomi estar morto; o tribunal aceita o pedido de Bola e cancela o testamento; Folak descobre a duplicidade de Prospero.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob visita Folak e descobre a traio de seu amigo; Bola diz a Prospero que pode influenciar o setor energtico; Lerato est no hospital e corre o risco de sofrer um aborto espontneo.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob e Folake tm um filho e ela anuncia a Jacob que vai a Lagos para apanhar seu irmo; Bola preso pelo assassinato de seu pai; o testamento reconhecido: Jacob se torna Chefe iorub; graas s suas ligaes, Bola sai da priso.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob, um brilhante homem de negcios, est prestes a obter um grande contrato governamental da rea de energia. Seu chefe revela a ele que seu pai biolgico e Jacob promete realizar o sonho do homem: construir um imprio e manter a famlia unida.

programme.title: O ltimo Drago, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma fora malvola toma conta dos reinos de Agonos, e um cavaleiro solitrio embarca em uma perigosa busca para encontrar o ltimo drago e salvar o mundo deste grande e crescente mal.

programme.title: Jesse James - O Roubo do Trem Negro, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A fama do fora-da-lei Jesse James inegvel. Apesar do conselho e da experincia de outros bandidos em relao a tentar roubar o popular Trem Negro, James est confiante e decidido a tom-lo.

programme.title: Terra dos Bravos, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O detetive Matthias Breecher contratado para rastrear o pior dos criminosos da guerra dos confederados. Enquanto percorre o Velho Oeste em busca de justia, sua determinao testada quando ele conhece uma pioneira que muito mais do que parece.

programme.title: Fora Maior, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Durante as frias nos Alpes Suos, uma famlia surpreendida por uma avalanche de neve que se aproxima. Desesperado, o pai, Toms, age impulsivamente e coloca em risco a segurana do seu casamento e tambm o relacionamento com seus filhos.

programme.title: Caf com Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Claire trabalha em um charmoso caf. Com palavras de sabedoria, ela ajuda e conforta diferentes tipos de clientes com seus conselhos sobre questes pessoais. Porm, um grande acontecimento est prestes a mudar a vida de todos os clientes do lugar.

programme.title: O Dono da Festa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Van Wilder ficou famoso na cidade por organizar as melhores festas da faculdade. Porm, o veterano forado a mudar sua rotina de sete anos aps perder a mesada do pai, deixando as festividades com os dias contados.

programme.title: Instinto Materno, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps trauma, uma me solteira se muda com a filha para uma isolada fazenda no interior. Mas logo coisas sinistras voltam a acontecer e seus instintos maternos so colocados prova novamente.

programme.title: O Garoto-Formiga 3, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O Garoto-Formiga entra em sua adolescncia e pensa em se aposentar, mas muda de ideia quando seu arqui-inimigo libertado da priso.

programme.title: De Volta ao Fundo do Mar, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O pequeno peixe Kevin apanhado em uma rede e levado para um tanque em um restaurante de Nova York. Agora, ele deve encontrar uma maneira de voltar para casa e reencontrar sua famlia.

programme.title: O Cachorro que Salvou o Vero, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu cachorro Zeus estraga uma festa, George o leva para uma escola de obedincia dirigida por um peculiar instrutor. Porm, o co consegue falhar em todos os testes, e ele procura a ajuda de um treinador com tcnicas especiais.

programme.title: Cansado dos insultos de Kaiba, Joey desafia Kaiba pelo terceiro lugar do Torneio da Cidade de Batalhas! Ser que Joey dominou estratgias suficientes para derrubar o mandachuva, ou Kaiba vai arrasar com Joey como a um cachorrinho pattico?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Kaiba ataca com seu poderoso Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis, mas Joey no tem monstros para se defender! A sorte de Joey acabou, ento hora dele confiar em suas habilidades!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: A batalha de Joey e Kaiba atinge seu clmax estrondoso, com o resultado do duelo dependendo de um ltimo giro da roleta do Mago do Tempo! Ser que Joey dar conta dessa dor de cabea e ensinar a Kaiba o que ser um verdadeiro duelista?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: o confronto crtico da Cidade de Batalhas, com o destino do mundo em jogo: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! Neste Jogo de Sombras perverso, se Yami Yugi perder, Yugi tirar frias permanentes no Reino das Sombras!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Marik prova que seu Drago Alado de R a Carta Deuses Egpcios mais forte, destruindo Slifer, o Drago Celeste! Nenhuma das cartas de Yugi pode aguentar seu ataque implacvel, mas um presente de Kaiba pode ser a chave para virar o duelo...
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Obelisco, o Atormentador vs... Obelisco, o Atormentador? Yugi no pode atingir os pontos de vida de Marik porque o indestrutvel Deus Egpcio Limo de Marik ressuscita a cada turno!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Mesmo com a fora de ataque infinita de Obelisco, o Atormentador, Yugi no consegue derrotar O Drago Alado de R!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: A Ilha da KaibaCorp explodir em questo de minutos, mas os motores do dirigvel esto quebrados! Como se j no fosse ruim, Kaiba e Mokuba desapareceram! Ser que Yugi e seus amigos escaparo da ilha a tempo ou afundaro para o fundo do mar?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Enquanto Ta e Serenity passeiam pela cidade de Domino e relembram as batalhas de seus amigos durante o Torneio da Cidade de Batalhas, elas veem quanto cresceram e como chegaram longe... e como ainda falta tanto a percorrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: As trs cartas de deuses egpcios so roubadas! Aparece um novo vilo aterrorizante! E, como se as coisas no pudessem piorar, monstros reais comeam a aparecer ao redor do mundo, aterrorizando a populao!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Com o Selo de Orichalcos, Gurimo no s pode ter dez monstros no campo ao mesmo tempo, mas cada criatura recebe carga extra de poder das energias malvolas de Orichalcos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: No s nosso mundo est beira do apocalipse, mas todo um domnio de monstros tambm est beira do colapso!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Fica muito confuso quando inimigos se tornam amigos... e amigos se tornam inimigos! Yugi e sua turma partem em uma jornada pelo pas quando um antigo inimigo caolho lhes pede ajuda!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Kaiba retorna ao Reino dos Duelistas para um confronto contra Pegasus! Usando seus mais novos e loucos terrores Toon, Pegasus est pronto para repetir sua vitria contra Kaiba!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: O poderoso demnio de Alister no s ganha pontos de ataque para cada monstro destrudo, mas tambm pode assumir o controle dos monstros de Kaiba!

programme.title: A caminho de Iluses Industriais, Yugi e seus amigos so emboscados por um bando de bandidos de motocicleta - at que a amiga favorita deles vem disparando ao resgate deles nas asas de sua Lady Harpia!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Ser possvel?! Mai se juntou ao inimigo! Usando a feitiaria sinistra do Selo de Orichalcos, Mai claramente pretende prender a alma de Joey, seguindo o plano mestre malvolo de Dartz!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR

programme.title: Aproveitando as habilidades arcanas do Selo de Orichalcos, Mai coordena suas Ladies Harpia em formaes de combate devastadoras para reduzir as foras de Joey a lixo!

programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Kyle est doente e sua me est tentando curar ele atravs da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas romnticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: Roman Holiday, (1953, Romance)
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: Bogie and Holden are the mega-rich Larrabee brothers of Long Island. Bogies all work, Holdens all playboy. But when Sabrina (Hepburn), daughter of the familys chauffeur, returns from Paris, the stage is set for some family fireworks.

programme.title: The Children's Hour: The Children's Hour, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: In this provocatively daring film, an attention-seeking schoolgirl vengefully spreads rumors that her teachers (Audrey Hepburn and Shirley MacLaine) are lesbians.

programme.title: Paris When It Sizzles, (1964, Romance)
programme.desc: Richard Quine directs George Axelrod's acerbic script (adapted from Julien Duvivier's La Fte Henriette) in this romantic comedy that reunites William Holden and Audrey Hepburn for the first time since 1954's Sabrina.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Odd Man Out, (1947, Crime)

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)

programme.title: Boogeyman, (2005, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.desc: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

programme.title: Hero (Ying xiong), (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Acclaimed by critics and loved by audiences around the world, Jet Li, Maggie Cheung, and Donnie Yen star in this Oscar and Golden Globe-nominated action-packed epic, in which a fearless warrior rises up to defy an empire and unite a nation.

programme.title: Badges of Fury, (2013, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In just 3 days, three cases of Smiling Murder shock Hong Kong. The young detective Wang Bu'er and his buddy Huang Feihong embark on an investigation full of excitement and unexpected events.

programme.title: The Order, (2002, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Martial arts icon Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a playboy criminal thrust into a dangerous world of ancient evil when he must investigate the disappearance of his archaeologist father. With Oscar winner Charlton Heston and Sofia Milos.

programme.title: Replicant, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: The Promotion, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two assistant managers of a corporate grocery store contend for a coveted promotion.

programme.title: Little Nicky, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngestand nicestson, Little Nicky, to bring the other two home.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Screwball)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally, (1989, Romance)
programme.desc: As Harry Burns and Sally Albright build their lives and careers in Manhattan, their paths continue to cross and their friendship continues to grow until they confront the decision whether to let their friendship develop into romance.

programme.title: It Had to Be You, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Two strangers meet and fall in love during the weekend that they are planning their respective weddings.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

programme.title: Wedding Daze, (2007, Romance)
programme.desc: After losing the woman of his dreams, Anderson is convinced he'll never fall in love again.

programme.title: No Strings Attached, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A hilarious story about Emma and Adam who set up a seemingly perfect arrangement with each other based soley on sex and having only one cardinal rule: No Strings Attached.

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Gwyneth Paltrow and Anthony Hopkins star in this powerful story of a young woman haunted by her father's past and the shadow of her own future. Based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning play, PROOF also stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Hope Davis.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

programme.title: The Professional, (1994, Action)

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Awakenings, (1990, Inspirational Drama)
